abstract: David M. Bernick will move to the Dechert firm, a transition that reflects a developing era of free agency in the once-stable world of corporate law, where partners commonly switch firms, sometimes for millions of dollars.
snippet: David M. Bernick will move to the Dechert firm, a transition that reflects a developing era of free agency in the once-stable world of corporate law, where partners commonly switch firms, sometimes for millions of dollars.
lead_paragraph: Last August, when the renowned trial lawyer David Boies announced the hiring of David M. Bernick, general counsel at the tobacco giant Philip Morris, he called the move a “huge step” for his firm, Boies Schiller & Flexner.

headline.main: Big Name Is Leaving Boies’s Firm After a Year
headline.print_headline: Big Name Is Leaving Boies’s Firm After a Year
